text: he adamana santano! Setana tamane ko'i kharabimam na nakhi de, jevum ke tene tamara mata-pitane jannata manthi kadhavi didha, te ja sthitimam temano posaka pana utari nakhavyo, jethi te temane temana guptanga batave, te ane tenum laskara tamane evi rite ju'e che ke tame te'one nathi jo'i sakata, ame setanone te lokona ja mitro banavya che je'o imana nathi lavata
